lesser-healing-potion.name: Lesser Healing Potion
lesser-healing-potion.description: A cloudy crimson liquid that tastes faintly of iron and honey. Apprentice alchemists brew these by the dozens in preparation for market days, though the quality varies wildly.

minor-healing-potion.name: Minor Healing Potion
minor-healing-potion.description: This deeper scarlet brew glows faintly when shaken, the light of captured vitality swirling within. The recipe requires three drops of morning dew collected from a plant that has never known shade.

greater-healing-potion.name: Greater Healing Potion
greater-healing-potion.description: Contained in reinforced crystal vials etched with protective runes, this luminous elixir pulses like a living heartbeat. Tales speak of warriors rising from death's threshold after a single draught.

lesser-vigor-potion.name: Lesser Vigor Potion
lesser-vigor-potion.description: Bright amber and effervescent, this tonic fizzes against the tongue and sends a pleasant warmth through tired muscles. Laborers and travelers keep these close.

minor-vigor-potion.name: Minor Vigor Potion
minor-vigor-potion.description: The deep gold liquid seems to catch light that isn't there, and those who drink it describe feeling as though they've just woken from the most restful sleep of their lives.

greater-vigor-potion.name: Greater Vigor Potion
greater-vigor-potion.description: This radiant elixir, the color of liquid sunshine, is brewed only during solstices when the boundary between Earthly and Cosmic magic grows thin. A single vial can restore a body pushed far beyond mortal limits.

lesser-clarity-potion.name: Lesser Clarity Potion
lesser-clarity-potion.description: Pale silver and utterly still regardless of how the vial moves, this potion quiets the storm of anxious thoughts. Those recovering from minor magical trauma or sleepless nights find it invaluable.

minor-clarity-potion.name: Minor Clarity Potion
minor-clarity-potion.description: The liquid shimmers with captured starlight, and drinking it feels like stepping from a crowded room into peaceful solitude. Scholars who have gazed too long into forbidden texts seek these out.

greater-clarity-potion.name: Greater Clarity Potion
greater-clarity-potion.description: While expensive, given their ornate containers and sheer magical properties of recovering mental wounds, often the issue is finding a marketplace which sells a large abundance of these.

minor-speed-potion.name: Minor Speed Potion
minor-speed-potion.description: A fizzing green concoction that tastes like wind and lightning. The effect is subtle—the world doesn't slow, but your legs simply cooperate more. Couriers and messengers consider these a professional necessity.
minor-speed-potion.effect: Add +10 ft to movement. Duration: 5 minutes. Does not stack.

lesser-speed-potion.name: Lesser Speed Potion
lesser-speed-potion.description: The bright emerald liquid crackles audibly in its vial, and drinkers report that their heartbeat sounds like galloping hooves for its duration. The crash afterward is unavoidable.
lesser-speed-potion.effect: Add +20 ft to movement. Duration: 3 minutes. Does not stack. After effect: -5 ft to movement for 1 minute.

greater-speed-potion.name: Greater Speed Potion
greater-speed-potion.description: This volatile teal elixir must be consumed immediately upon opening, as exposure to air causes it to evaporate within seconds. Those who drink it describe the world becoming a blur of colors and shapes.
greater-speed-potion.effect: Add +50 ft to movement. Duration: 3 minutes. Does not stack. After effect: -15 ft to movement for 1 minute, then gain exhausted.

borrowed-time-potion.name: Borrowed Time Potion
borrowed-time-potion.description: Thick as syrup and black as a moonless night, this potion tastes like nothing at all—a concerning absence that unsettles most drinkers. It steals moments from your future self to give to your present.
borrowed-time-potion.effect: Gain +3 AP for the current turn. Lose -2 AP the following turn. Does not stack.

greater-leap-potion.name: Greater Leap Potion
greater-leap-potion.description: This effervescent violet brew bubbles with barely contained energy. Drinkers feel suddenly lighter, as though gravity has loosened its grip specifically on them. Performers and acrobats prize these.
greater-leap-potion.effect: Gain +30 ft to your vertical leap distance. Does not stack. Duration: 1 minute.

height-manipulation-potion.name: Height Manipulation Potion
height-manipulation-potion.description: The swirling, iridescent liquid inside never settles into a single color, shifting through the spectrum like an uncertain thought. Its effects are famously unpredictable.
height-manipulation-potion.effect: Manipulate yourself to a random height between 1 and 10 ft tall. Duration: 5 minutes.

cloaking-potion.name: Cloaking Potion
cloaking-potion.description: Completely transparent and visible only by the slight distortion it creates in its vial, this potion has no taste, no smell, and no texture—drinking it feels like swallowing nothing at all.
cloaking-potion.effect: Become invisible to the non-enchanted eye. Individuals can hear, smell, and feel you, but will not be able to see you unless able to see invisible individuals or objects. Duration: 10 minutes.
cloaking-potion.notes: Does not mask sound, smell, or physical presence

roll-of-bandages.name: Roll of Bandages
roll-of-bandages.description: Clean linen treated with herbs and minor healing enchantments. These bandages represent the intersection of mundane medicine and magical craft. Experienced adventurers never travel without several rolls.
roll-of-bandages.effect: Recover 5D6 HP on application and recover 1D6 HP each minute. Duration: 10 minutes.

water.name: Water
water.description: Pure, clean water, perhaps the most underestimated restorative in existence. In a world of glowing potions and enchanted elixirs, the simple act of proper hydration is easily forgotten.

juice.name: Juice
juice.description: Fresh-pressed fruit juice, its sweetness providing quick energy to flagging bodies. The variety matters less than the freshness.

soda.name: Soda
soda.description: The carbonated beverages of the modern eras. The sugar and bubbles seem to ease mental strain in ways that healers cannot fully explain—perhaps it is simply the familiarity of the taste.

quick-meal.name: Quick Meal
quick-meal.description: A practical meal assembled without ceremony—bread, cheese, dried meat, perhaps a handful of nuts or fruit. Nothing elegant, but everything the body needs.
quick-meal.notes: Restoration comes from nutrition, not magic

nice-meal.name: Nice Meal
nice-meal.description: A proper meal taken at a proper table, with courses that arrive warm and seasoned with care. To sit, to taste, to savor—these acts remind the weary soul that life holds pleasures worth protecting.
nice-meal.notes: Veterans know that coin spent on a good meal before battle is never wasted

codebreakers-tools.name: Codebreaker's Tools
codebreakers-tools.description: A set of specialized tools for deciphering codes and breaking encryptions.
codebreakers-tools.effect: Required for Codebreaker skill checks. Grants +1 D20 on code-related checks.

lockpicking-tools.name: Lockpicking Tools
lockpicking-tools.description: A set of picks, tension wrenches, and other implements for bypassing locks.
lockpicking-tools.effect: Required for Master Lockpicker skill checks.

medical-kit.name: Medical Kit
medical-kit.description: A comprehensive medical kit containing bandages, antiseptics, splints, and basic surgical tools.
medical-kit.effect: Required for Bandaid Maker skill checks. Allows treatment of injuries in the field.

cooking-utensils.name: Cooking Utensils
cooking-utensils.description: Portable cooking equipment including pots, pans, utensils, and basic spices.
cooking-utensils.effect: Required for Best Cook skill checks. Allows preparation of meals with bonuses.
